Total.tooltip: Total power, summing the leakage power from the leakage scenario and dynamic power from dynamic scenario chosen for summary reporting.  Total power doesn't include glitch power.  These scenarios can be specified using 'set_qor_data_options -leakage_scenario/-dynamic_scenario'.  Otherwise, they are derived automatically from the highest power scenarios.  By default this is the active leakage or dynamic scenario with the highest total power.  These scenarios are printed in the RPT-134 message in the logfile.

Leakage.tooltip: Leakage power from the leakage scenario chosen for summary reporting.  This scenario can be specified using 'set_qor_data_options -leakage_scenario'.  Otherwise, it is derived automatically from the highest leakage power scenario.  This scenario is printed in the RPT-134 message in the logfile.

Internal.tooltip: Internal power from the dynamic scenario chosen for summary reporting.  This scenario can be specified using 'set_qor_data_options -dynamic_scenario'.  Otherwise, it is derived automatically from the highest dynamic power scenario.  This scenario is printed in the RPT-134 message in the logfile.  If glitch power is reported, this is the internal power excluding glitch internal power, which is shown in the GlitchInt column.

Switching.tooltip: Switching power from the dynamic scenario chosen for summary reporting.  This scenario can be specified using 'set_qor_data_options -dynamic_scenario'.  Otherwise, it is derived automatically from the highest dynamic power scenario.  This scenario is printed in the RPT-134 message in the logfile.  If glitch power is reported, this is the switching power excluding glitch switching power, which is shown in the GlitchSw column.

FlopBank%.tooltip: Banking ratio for flops only: MBitFlops / (1BitFlops + MBitFlops)

Bits/Flop.tooltip: Average number of bits per flop from banking

Bits/Seq.tooltip: Average number of bits per sequential cell from banking

Gated%.tooltip: Percentage of total registers that are gated

combinational.tooltip: Total power of the combinational power group

register.tooltip: Total power of the register power group

sequential.tooltip: Total power of the sequential power group

memory.tooltip: Total power of the memory power group

io_pad.tooltip: Total power of the io_pad power group

black_box.tooltip: Total power of the black_box power group

clock_network.tooltip: Total power of the clock_network power group
